name: Mailjet
description: Mailjet is a real-time Cloud Emailing platform: scalable, agile and flexible! Our unique algorithm boosts your deliverability and our platform provides in-depth insight so you can optimize more than ever. Because 20% of emails never reach the inbox Mailjet is a logical choice!
